info.title: Country/Region - Read
info.description: The service enables you to retrieve country/region information like ISO codes, currencies and tax procedure.

x-sap-shortText: Read country/region master data using this inbound service

values.text: SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning Integration(SAP_COM_0087)
[Import Connection setup with SAP Analytics Cloud(1YB)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1YB " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Reads the items of all countries/regions.
get.description: Reads the countries/regions available in your system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

parameters.name: Country
parameters.description: Country/Region Key

get.description: Reads texts and related fields from a specific country/region.

get.summary: Reads the texts of all country/region items.
get.description: Reads texts and related fields from all country/region items. The related fields include the language and ID.

get.summary: Reads the texts of a country/region for a specific language and country/region key.
get.description: Reads the texts and related fields of a country/region. The related fields include the language and country/region key.

get.summary: Reads the country/region related to the text item.

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
